software_instance = state_change['object']
 portal = software_instance.getPortalObject()
 # Get required arguments
 kwargs = state_change.kwargs
 software_release_url_string = state_change.kwargs['software_release']
 requested_partition_reference = kwargs["partition_reference"]
 shared = kwargs["shared"]
 software_type = kwargs["software_type"]
 instance_xml = kwargs["instance_xml"]
 filter_kw = kwargs["filter_kw"]
 
 # Get root software instance
 predecessor_software_instance = software_instance
 while (predecessor_software_instance is not None):
 root_software_instance = predecessor_software_instance
 predecessor_software_instance = predecessor_software_instance.getPredecessorRelatedValue(
 portal_type="Software Instance")
 
 tag = "%s_%s_%s_inProgress" % (root_software_instance.getUid(), software_type,
 requested_partition_reference)
 
 # Check if it already exists
 request_software_instance = software_instance.portal_catalog.getResultValue(
 portal_type='Software Instance',
 title=requested_partition_reference,
 source_reference=software_type,
 root_uid=root_software_instance.getUid(),
 )
 
 if (request_software_instance is None):
 if (portal.portal_activities.countMessageWithTag(tag) > 0):
 # The software instance is already under creation but can not be fetched from catalog
 # As it is not possible to fetch informations, it is better to raise an error
 raise NotImplementedError(tag)
 else:
 # First time that the software instance is requested
 # Create a new one
 module = software_instance.getDefaultModule(portal_type="Software Instance")
 request_software_instance = module.newContent(
 portal_type="Software Instance",
 title=requested_partition_reference,
 source_reference=software_type,
 text_content=instance_xml,
 activate_kw={'tag': tag},
 **portal.Base_getNewSoftwareInstanceCoordinate()
 )
 request_software_instance.portal_workflow.doActionFor(request_software_instance, 'validate_action')
 sale_packing_list_line = context.SoftwareInstance_getInstanceSetupPackingListLine(state_change)
 hosting_subscription_uid = sale_packing_list_line.getAggregateValue(portal_type='Hosting Subscription').getUid()
 request_software_instance.requestComputerPartition(
 software_release=software_release_url_string,
 hosting_subscription_uid=hosting_subscription_uid,
 shared=shared,
 software_type=software_type,
 tag=tag)
 else:
 # Update existing software instance
 # Sale Packing List interaction has to be requested automatically with an interaction workflow
 request_software_instance.edit(
 text_content=instance_xml,
 activate_kw={'tag': tag},
 )
 # Update the predecessor category of the original caller
 predecessor_software_instance = request_software_instance.getPredecessorRelatedValue(
 portal_type="Software Instance")
 if predecessor_software_instance is None:
 raise ValueError('Requested Software Instance %s should have a predecessor' % request_software_instance.getRelativeUrl())
 else:
 predecessor_uid_list = predecessor_software_instance.getPredecessorUidList()
 predecessor_uid_list.remove(request_software_instance.getUid())
 predecessor_software_instance.edit(
 predecessor_uid_list=predecessor_uid_list,
 activate_kw={'tag': tag},)
 
 predecessor_list = software_instance.getPredecessorList() + [request_software_instance.getRelativeUrl()]
 software_instance.edit(

 activate_kw={'tag': tag},)
